attributes.action: Make labeling of Halal and Kosher meat compulsory.
attributes.additional_details: I would like to draw attention to the general public on the different ways in which animals are slaughtered in this country and indeed abroad. I am sure that the general public are buying meat blindly and should be informed in accordance.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to make it ilegal for oulets to sell Halal or Kosher meats without clear labeling to state that it is indeed properly certified Halal or Kosher.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require all meat to be labelled to indicate the method of slaughter, as such
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/704797
